article_title: Meetings set as new hospital sale deal moves forward

article_metadata.description: COLDWATER — The Community Health Center of Branch County has a deal ready for consideration with ProMedica Health Systems of Toledo for a management agreement with an option to buy the county-owned hospital, CEO Randy DeGroot told the Branch County Commission during a work session Thursday.County commissioner hospital liaison Jon Houtz said the deal is a three-year management contract before sale.DeGroot said one of the key issues is tying down the liability for employee pensions and the
article_metadata.author: Don Reid dwreid@aol.com; @DReidTDR
